name: test_e2e_with_logs[322_CMD_BLIND_002]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `CMD_BLIND_002` |
| **Name** | Network-based time delay detection |
| **Category** | CMDINJ |
| **Subcategory** | blind_command_injection |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `&& ping -c 10 127.0.0.1`
- **Encoded**: `%26%26%20ping%20-c%2010%20127.0.0.1`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~56000ms
- **Timestamp**: 14:45:02.000 UTC

## Rule Mapping

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Expected Rule** | `[NGINX CMDi] Advanced command injection attempt` |
| **Matched Rule** | `[NGINX CMDi] Advanced command injection attempt test_id=CMD_BLIND_002-1770821102369-fp2ocn pattern_id=CMD_BLIND_002 uri=/?q=%26%26%20ping%20-c%2010%20127.0.0.1 client=127.0.0.1` |
| **Rule Match** | ✅ Match |

## Detection Evidence

**Rule Name**: [NGINX CMDi] Advanced command injection attempt test_id=CMD_BLIND_002-1770821102369-fp2ocn pattern_id=CMD_BLIND_002 uri=/?q=%26%26%20ping%20-c%2010%20127.0.0.1 client=127.0.0.1
